Structs/DALIMember.html#/s:vV4DALI10DALI.name: location
Structs/DALIMember.html#/s:vV4DALI10DALI.abstract: User’s chosen origin location (data used by mappy)

Structs/DALIMember.html#/s:vV4DALI10DALI.name: skills
Structs/DALIMember.html#/s:vV4DALI10DALI.abstract: A list of skills the user has listed for themselves

Structs/DALIMember.html#/s:vV4DALI10DALI.name: dirty
Structs/DALIMember.html#/s:vV4DALI10DALI.abstract: Signifies if data has been changed in the object without saving to the server

Structs/DALIMember.html#/s:ZFV4DALI10DAL.name: parse(_:)
Structs/DALIMember.html#/s:ZFV4DALI10DAL.abstract: Parses a json object and returns a DALIUser object if it can find all the required information

Classes/DALILocation/Shared.html#/s:ZFVC.name: get(callback:)
Classes/DALILocation/Shared.html#/s:ZFVC.abstract: Get a list of all the people in the lab who are sharing their location

Classes/DALILocation/Shared.html#/s:ZFVC.name: submit(inDALI:entering:callback:)
Classes/DALILocation/Shared.html#/s:ZFVC.abstract: Submit the current location of the user

Classes/DALILocation/Tim.html#/s:ZFVC4DA.name: get(callback:)
Classes/DALILocation/Tim.html#/s:ZFVC4DA.abstract: Gets the current data on Tim’s Location and returns it.

Classes/DALILocation/Tim.html#/s:ZFVC4DA.name: submit(inDALI:inOffice:callback:)
Classes/DALILocation/Tim.html#/s:ZFVC4DA.abstract: Submit information about tim’s location. Will generate an error if user is not tim

Classes/DALILocation/Tim.html.name: Tim
Classes/DALILocation/Tim.html.abstract: A simple struct that holds booleans that indicate Tim’s location. Use it wisely ðŸ˜‰

Classes/DALILocation/Shared.html.name: Shared
Classes/DALILocation/Shared.html.abstract: A simple struct that handles getting a list of shared user

Classes/DALILocation.html#/s:ZvC4DALI12D.name: sharing
Classes/DALILocation.html#/s:ZvC4DALI12D.abstract: The current user is sharing this device’s location

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Config.htm.name: numSelected
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Config.htm.abstract: The number of options a user can select when voting

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Config.htm.name: ordered
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Config.htm.abstract: Boolean to indicate whether the user should put their options in order

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Config.htm.name: json()
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Config.htm.abstract: Get the JSON value of this option

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.name: points
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.abstract: The number of points the option has gotten. Only accessable by admin

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.name: awards
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.abstract: The awards this option has earned. Available only for admins or for events with results released

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.name: isVotedFor
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.abstract: A boolean to indicate if the user is voting for this one

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.name: voteOrder
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.abstract: An int to indicate the order (starting at 1 ending at numSelected). Only nescesary if event is ordered

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.name: json()
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.abstract: Get the JSON value of this option

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.name: Option
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent/Option.htm.abstract: An option that a user can vote for.

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:FC.name: json()
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:FC.abstract: Converts the data stored in the event into a JSON format that the API will understand

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:FC.name: getResults(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:FC.abstract: Get the public results for this event

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:FC.name: getOptions(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:FC.abstract: Get all the options for this event

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:FC.name: submitVote(options:callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:FC.abstract: Submit the given options as a vote

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:FC.name: saveResults(options:callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:FC.abstract: Save the awards given to the given options

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:ZF.name: getReleasedEvents(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:ZF.abstract: Get all events that have results released

Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:ZF.name: get(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent/VotingEvent.html#/s:ZF.abstract: Get voting events as an admin. The signed in user must be an admin, otherwise will exit immediately

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:vC4DALI9DALIEv.name: dirty
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:vC4DALI9DALIEv.abstract: Signifies when this event object contains information that has not been saved

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:vC4DALI9DALIEv.name: editable
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:vC4DALI9DALIEv.abstract: A flag that indicates if this event can be edited

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:vC4DALI9DALIEv.name: isNow
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:vC4DALI9DALIEv.abstract: A flag that indicates if this event is happening now

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:ZFC4DALI9DALIE.name: parse(_:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:ZFC4DALI9DALIE.abstract: Parses a given json object and returns an event object if it can find one

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:FC4DALI9DALIEv.name: json()
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:FC4DALI9DALIEv.abstract: Get the event in JSON form. Converts all data in the event into a form the API would use

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:ZFC4DALI9DALIE.name: getUpcoming(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:ZFC4DALI9DALIE.abstract: Gets all upcoming events within a week from now

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:ZFC4DALI9DALIE.name: getPublicUpcoming(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:ZFC4DALI9DALIE.abstract: Gets all upcoming events within a week from now that are public

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:ZFC4DALI9DALIE.name: checkIn(major:minor:callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:ZFC4DALI9DALIE.abstract: Checks in the current user to whatever event is happening now

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:FC4DALI9DALIEv.name: enableCheckin(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:FC4DALI9DALIEv.abstract: Enables checkin on the event, and gets back major and minor values to be used when advertizing

Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:FC4DALI9DALIEv.name: getMembersCheckedIn(callback:)
Classes/DALIEvent.html#/s:FC4DALI9DALIEv.abstract: Gets a list of members who have checked in

Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:FOC4DA.name: Unauthorized
Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:FOC4DA.abstract: The request did not have proper authorization

Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:FOC4DA.name: UnknownError
Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:FOC4DA.abstract: A unknown error has occured. Information about the error is stored. Code will be -1 if there is no code

Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:FOC4DA.name: InvalidJSON
Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:FOC4DA.abstract: Response was not JSON! Text version is stored

Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:FOC4DA.name: Unprocessable
Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:FOC4DA.abstract: The data sent to the server was not able to be processed for whatever reason

Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:FOC4DA.name: BadRequest
Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:FOC4DA.abstract: The data sent was not valid for the route. Consult the documentation for the route you are using

Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:FOC4DA.name: UnexpectedResponse
Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:FOC4DA.abstract: The response to the request was not as expected. Consult the documentation for the route you are using

Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:FOC4DA.name: Unfound
Classes/DALIError/General.html#/s:FOC4DA.abstract: The requested object(s) were not found on the server

Classes/DALIError/Create.html#/s:FOC4DAL.name: AlreadyCreated
Classes/DALIError/Create.html#/s:FOC4DAL.abstract: The object you are calling create on has already been created

Classes/DALIError/General.html.name: General
Classes/DALIError/General.html.abstract: Pertaining to the General opperations. Mostly used by the ServerCommunicator

Classes/DALIConfig.html#/s:vC4DALI10DALI.name: sharingDefault
Classes/DALIConfig.html#/s:vC4DALI10DALI.abstract: A default value for the sharing preference

Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:C4DALI7DALIapi15.name: SuccessCallback
Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:C4DALI7DALIapi15.abstract: A callback reporting either success or failure in the requested action

Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:ZFC4DALI7DALIapi.name: signin(authCode:done:)
Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:ZFC4DALI7DALIapi.abstract: Signs in on the server using Google Signin provided server auth code

Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:ZFC4DALI7DALIapi.name: signin(accessToken:refreshToken:done:)
Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:ZFC4DALI7DALIapi.abstract: Signs in on the server using access and refresh tokens provided by Google Signin. Will not sign in if already signed in

Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:ZFC4DALI7DALIapi.name: signin(accessToken:refreshToken:forced:done:)
Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:ZFC4DALI7DALIapi.abstract: Signs in on the server using access and refresh tokens provided by Google Signin

Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:ZFC4DALI7DALIapi.name: signOut()
Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:ZFC4DALI7DALIapi.abstract: Signs out of your account on the API

Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:ZFC4DALI7DALIapi.name: sendSimpleNotification(with:and:to:callback:)
Classes/DALIapi.html#/s:ZFC4DALI7DALIapi.abstract: Sends a notification to EVERY device with the given tag set to true

Classes/DALIapi.html.name: DALIapi
Classes/DALIapi.html.abstract: Static class to configure and handle general requests for the DALI api framework

Classes/DALIConfig.html.name: DALIConfig
Classes/DALIConfig.html.abstract: Configurations for the DALIapi framework can be stored and handled using this

Classes/DALIError.html.name: DALIError
Classes/DALIError.html.abstract: A set of errors used by the DALIapi framework to signal the user when there is an issue

Classes/DALILocation.html.name: DALILocation
Classes/DALILocation.html.abstract: A static struct that contains all location updates and queries
